      • initButtons

        private void initButtons()
        Initializes the buttons for subscribing, unsubscribing, editin, deleting and creating topics. Sets their listeners for the selection lists for checking if the button needs to be disabled.

      • initSearchField

        private void initSearchField()
        Initializes the listener for the search text field to notify the table manager when it's value changes.
